title: Nee Illai Endraal Lyrics 8 Thottakkal
stanzas:
Nee Illai Endraal Song Lyrics 8 Thottakkal (Ettu Thottaakkal)
#SundaramurthyKS #KuttiRevathi #Haricharan #Vandanasrinivasan

Nee illai endraal
enakena yaarum illaiye
yaen idhai seithaai
thunai ena yaarume illaiye

nee thaan naan
udainthu pogaathe
kadhalaal kadanthu povome

kalangarai velichamum
anaindhu ponaale.
kadalinil suzhalinil
engu poven naan.

unakkena vazhukindrene
uyirena thaangukindrene
unakindha kobam yeno
kaayam yeno
ennidam vaa anbe
ennidam vaa anbe

Nee illai endraal
enakena yaarum illaiye
yaen idhai seithaai
thunai ena yaarume illaiye

nee thaan naan
udainthu pogaathe
kadhalaal kadanthu povome

unakkena uruginen
ahhaahhh
uyiril karaigiren.
ahhaahhh
analena erigiren
ahhaahhh
alayaai udaigiren.
ahhaahhh
